alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 8:48AM CST until December 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow with total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central North Dakota, including areas along and north of Highway 2. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous Today, and Sunday through Monday. For Sunday through Monday, travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For today, a narrow band of heavier snow may produce localized amounts as high as 6 to 8 inches, between Interstate 94 to the South Dakota Border.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Dickey; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; Stutsman
